name: Goodreads Urdu
description:
View Goodreads's urdu in Nastaliq font.

Before installing please get these two fonts and install them on your computer.
1. https://www.google.com/get/noto/#serif-lgc
2. https://www.google.com/get/noto/#nastaliq-aran

Replace fonts in the stylesheet with your own if you don't like them.
